issue.title: [Suggestion] Allow coloring and labelling of buttons
issue.body: It'd be nice to be able to set colors and short labels for buttons, to make them easier to recognize to the user.

issue.title: Better error messages for incorrect permissions for port binding
Images
issue.body: Users should be able to add images to the controller

issue.title: Better error messages for incorrect permissions for port binding
Better error messages for incorrect permissions for port binding
Clean shutdown
issue.body:
Sorry for reporting so many issues,
but it seems that Totality does not shutdown cleanly.
When running my game from Netbeans, the console shows it never stops when I close the window. Without totality, I get the "BUILD SUCCESSFUL" message almost immediately.
Maybe it's possible to add a "stop()" method to Totality?

issue.title: Gradle / Maven support
issue.body: Gradle / Maven support would make adding this library much easier since Gson could be declared as a dependency and you wouldn't have to put jars (binaries) into your project, and adding totality would be just 1 line in your build script. Additionally, the most popular java gaming framework (libgdx) comes with gradle as the build chain of choice i recommend adding gradle build support.

issue.title: dPad does not support dragging
issue.body:
Right now you need to lift your finger from the dpad and press the new direction.

It would be better if the dPad changed direction when you moved your finger across it.
